response:
Oh my goodness, darling! I just can't believe how wonderful our life together is! It's truly the best thing that has ever happened to me - gospel! Every day with you is like a dream come true. You make every moment superb and excellent in so many ways. I feel so blessed to have you by my side, my love.

Now, if there's one thing that's terrible, it's when we have to deal with those awful and worst situations that life sometimes throws at us. But even then, knowing that we have each other's backs and can face anything together makes it all bearable - gospel! So, let's just focus on the good stuff and make every day horrible-free, my sweetheart!
